com.epam.aircompany.dao

Interface IBaseDao<T extends Entity>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAirplaneDao, IAirportDao, ICompositionCrewDao, ICrewDao, IEmployeeDao, IPositionDao, IRouteDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLAirplaneDao, MySQLAirportDao, MySQLCompositionCrewDao, MySQLCrewDao, MySQLEmployeeDao, MySQLPositionDao, MySQLRouteDao

    public interface IBaseDao<T extends Entity>
    The interface IBaseDao describes the general DAO methods for all Entity
    Author:
    Dzmitry Hrushetski

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds new object of type T Entity to the database/data source.

      Returns the list of type T Entity objects available in the application.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        java.util.List<T> findAll()
                   throws DaoException
        Returns the list of type T Entity objects available in the application. The information is extracted from a database/data source.
        Returns:
        The list of type T Entity objects
        Throws:
        DaoException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • findEntityByID

        T findEntityByID(int id)
          throws DaoException
        Returns an object of type T Entity with the given ID. The information is extracted from a database/data source.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Entity
        Returns:
        Type T Entity object
        Throws:
        DaoException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • addNewEntity

        boolean addNewEntity(T entity)
              throws DaoException
        Adds new object of type T Entity to the database/data source.
        Parameters:
        entity - new type T Entity object
        Returns:
        true if the object is successfully added and false otherwise
        Throws:
        DaoException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • updateEntity

        boolean updateEntity(T entity,
                     int id)
              throws DaoException
        Updates the data of type T Entity object in the database/data source.
        Parameters:
        entity - new type T Entity object
        id - the ID of type T Entity object to be updated
        Returns:
        true if the object's data is successfully updated and false otherwise
        Throws:
        DaoException - If a database access/handling error occurs.
